body_html:
@martinwicke @benoitsteiner @vrv Further information: I thought this might have to do with the special bazel flags required in Mac. So I tested the following flag combinations for "bazel test //tensorflow/python/..."

[no flag]
-c opt  
--linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
-c opt --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
-c opt --genrule_strategy=standalone --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names

All of them failed in the same way, i.e., 46 of the 151 Python unit tests failed.

body:
@martinwicke @benoitsteiner @vrv Further information: I thought this might have to do with the special bazel flags required in Mac. So I tested the following flag combinations for "bazel test //tensorflow/python/..."

```
[no flag]
-c opt  
--linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
-c opt --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
-c opt --genrule_strategy=standalone --linkopt=headerpad_max_install_names
```

All of them failed in the same way, i.e., 46 of the 151 Python unit tests failed.
